meanings.definition: A person employed to manage a household and perform cleaning and other domestic tasks.
meanings.sent1: The housekeepers keep the house tidy and clean every day.
meanings.sent2: We hired housekeepers to help us with the household chores.
meanings.sent3: The housekeepers found a creative way to organize the pantry.
meanings.sent4: The housekeepers are the unsung heroes of every home.
meanings.sent5: I always appreciate the hard work of housekeepers in keeping our house spotless.

meanings.definition: The staff responsible for cleaning and maintaining a building or facility.
meanings.sent1: The housekeepers at the hotel ensure that every room is sparkling clean.
meanings.sent2: The school employs housekeepers to keep the classrooms neat and tidy.
meanings.sent3: The housekeepers had a friendly competition to see who could clean the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The housekeepers work diligently behind the scenes to maintain the building's cleanliness.
meanings.sent5: The housekeepers take pride in their work and it shows in the impeccable condition of the facility.
